backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a profile photo update to the HeroSection component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles in the CV site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout composing all CV sections and footer while applying SEO metadata.
frontend/src/components/cv/ContactSectio: Renders a contact grid with icons, links, and labels including email, phone, and social profiles.
frontend/src/components/cv/EducationSect: Displays education entries with degree, institution, dates, location, and optional details.
frontend/src/components/cv/ExperienceSec: Timeline-style work experience list showing roles, companies, locations, and bullet descriptions.
frontend/src/components/cv/HeroSection.t: Hero banner with name, title, summary, updated LinkedIn profile photo, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/cv/ProjectsSecti: Shows project cards with descriptions, tech tags, and links to live demos and GitHub.
frontend/src/components/cv/Section.tsx: Generic layout wrapper providing section spacing, titles, and container styling.
frontend/src/components/cv/SkillsSection: Lists skill categories with styled badge-like tags for each skill.
frontend/src/components/cv/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll-based active section highlighting and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/data/cv.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and static CV data including hero, experience, education, skills, projects, and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the static CV site.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoFromCvData.ts: Updates document title and meta tags based on CV hero data for SEO and social sharing.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles and theme variables defining colors, typography, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, and pending request to update the Hero section profile photo.
